BRIDGE.name: Bridge of the Enterprise
BRIDGE.desc: You are standing on the bridge of the Enterprise. Lt. Commander Data is at Ops, and Wesley has the helm. Mr. Wolf is braking something about Roomulans, blah blah blah.

READYROOM.name: Captain's Ready Room
READYROOM.desc: Your are in the captain's ready room. Captain Picard is seated behind his desk, sipping an Earl Grey tea, hot.

items.desc: A type 1 phaser is on the captain's desk
items.take: You take the phaser while the captain isn't looking and slip it into your pocket_ Oh, wait, your uniform doesn't have pockets.
